entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as the one who organized a meeting and recruited students for his army. He is described as being pleasant and cheerful.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is introduced as the one who is accusing Dumbledore of plotting against him.

entities.name: marietta
entities.description: Marietta is mentioned as nodding in agreement with Dumbledore.

entities.name: miss edgecombe
entities.description: Miss Edgecombe is mentioned as being invited to the meeting by mistake.
